alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Jasper; Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henry, central Butts, northwestern Jasper and southern Newton Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Rocky Plains, or 10 miles southwest of Covington, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Covington, Jackson, Locust Grove, Oxford, Porterdale, Flovilla, Mansfield, Jenkinsburg, Stewart, Blacksville, Turtle Cove, Ola, Worthville, Starrsville, Calvin, Eudora, North Alcovy, Fincherville and Oak Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
